mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id user_id, u.phone phone, u.password password, u.status status FROM user u WHERE u.phone = #{phone} AND u.password = #{password}
SELECT count(*) FROM user u WHERE u.phone = #{phone}

SELECT e.employee_id employee_id, e.employee_account employee_account, e.employee_password employee_password, e.Employee_type Employee_type, e.employee_name employee_name FROM employee e WHERE e.employee_account = #{employee_account} AND e.employee_password = #{employee_password} AND e.Employee_type = #{employee_type}
